wikipedia_page.main: Lieutenant-General David Leslie Judd CB (born 1950) is a former Quartermaster-General to the Forces.

response: He was promoted air marshal and became Deputy Commander Allied Joint Force Command Brunssum in May 2007, in succession to Lieutenant General David Judd. Air Chief Marshal Moran was appointed Commander-in-Chief of Air Command on 3 April 2009. Moran was appointed a Knight Commander of the Order of the Bath in the 2009 New Year Honours.
